code: import{loadUsers}from"./loadUsers";export var addUser=function addUser(_ref){var userId=_ref.userId,email=_ref.email,role=_ref.role,name=_ref.name,phone=_ref.phone,pass=_ref.pass;return function(dispatch){var options={method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json;charset=utf-8"},body:JSON.stringify({userId:userId,name:name,email:email,phone:phone,pas:pass,role:role})};fetch("https://wsuno.xyz/api/addUser",options).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){if(!data.OK){throw Error('Ошибка запроса на сервер');}dispatch(loadUsers({userId:userId}));}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};
